Row.Text: Hi, I'm Tenko... wait, no, no, no, forget that. I'm Hinanawi Tenshi. Welcome to the Celestials' colony.
Oh, look who's over there! Come on here! I'm Tenshi, nice to meet you. Can you spare a moment to play with me?
Hello! People call me Tenko, but don't you dare call me that! Let it be known that I'm Hinanawi Tenshi, NOT TENKO!
Well... Uh... Ok. I suppose I will have to go back.
Aww... It was just getting fun! Please give me another chance! I don't want to go back!
Well... You beat me. I thought I was good enough for you but it seems like there are people stronger than me.
Hello! Come here to play again?
What would you like to do?
You've here to see the Celestials play? Come join us!
Every time I see you I swear I want to chop you up into little pieces with my sword, but my sword doesn't hurt.
I swear, I want to sneak into your capital and land a huge earthshaker.
You're no fun, and it seems like the others are agreeing on this matter.
Hello! Some of the Celestials are in a festival about how you and I are such good friends.
What's up? You've got any fun games we can play?
I'm getting bored, and you look like fun practice opponent. Ready or not, here I come!
No one's playing with me and I'm getting so bored, so I'll have to challenge you to a game that you can't refuse. Prepare yourself!
You look like you could use some fun, and I'm sure you won't say no to this!
